author: The Spiffing Brit
description:
Get Anno 117: Pax Romana on Steam: https://gsght.com/c/x3rn5o

Today in Anno 117: Pax Romana, I shall be showing you how to break the economy of the Roman Empire itself! That’s right, Paradox and Ubisoft have somehow created a game where I, the humble Spiffing Brit, can turn a simple Roman fishing village into a gold-spewing mega-city producing infinite wealth faster than Nero can burn down Rome.

Anno 117: Pax Romana is a genre-defining strategic city builder set during the height of the Roman Empire. You can expand your influence through trade, diplomacy, or military might — but as always, I will be ignoring all of that and instead using pure economic exploits to create the world’s most overpowered Roman province.

Will I use my vast wealth to bring peace to the empire, or will I accidentally crash the denarius? There’s only one way to find out.

Join this channel to get access to perks:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRHXUZ0BxbkU2MYZgsuFgkQ/join
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/S
title: Inventing CAPITALISM  for Romans - Anno 117 is a perfectly balanced game with no exploits #ad
